pageTitle: Tory Burch Kamilla Striped Jacket | SHOPBOP
textBeforeTable: Model Measurements Size & Fit Length: 20in / 51cm, from shoulder MEASUREMENTS Imported, China. Dry clean. Sleeve lining: 100% polyester. Shell: 100% cotton. Fabric: Double-knit. A striped Tory Burch blazer styled in cozy double-knit is casual and versatile with a tailored silhouette. Notched lapels frame the single-button placket, and flap pockets lay at the hips. Unlined. textAfterTable: Because sizing and cut will vary between brands, please use this chart as a general guide. If you are between sizes or need assistance selecting the proper size, please contact Customer Service Designer One of Forbes’ “Most Powerful Women in the World,” Tory Burch is an award-winning designer whose aesthetic echoes her chic personal style. Her eponymous brand has become synonymous with sophistication, elegance, and refinement since its 2004 debut. Emanating attainable luxury, the Tory Burch label is classic American sportswear at its finest, offering an impeccably crafted selection of apparel, handbags, shoes, and accessories coveted by the likes of Gwyneth Paltrow, Jennifer Lopez, and Oprah Winfrey.
